pages.text: $(li)Creepies are the smaller version of the common Creepers.$(br)$(li)They can be summoned in an area with green particles produced by the explosion of the $(l:patchouli:tools/savage_and_ravage/spore_bomb)Spore Bomb$(/l).$(br)$(li)The Creepiers summoned of this way, will chase an explote to nearby creatures.
They spawn in groups of 8 Creepies for every area with green particles.

$(li)They can be summoned with Creeper Spores too.$(br)$(li)In this case, if you are near of the area with green particles, the Creepies will follow you, until you attack some creature.$(br)$(li)Then, those creatures will chase the attacked creature until they are close enough to explote.

$(li)In a while, Creepiers grow up into Creepers, at this moment they will become hostile and they will attack you.$(br)$(li)You can accelearate this process giving Bone Meal to Creepiers.$(br)$(li)You can give them Poisonous Potatoes to stop this grow up process forever.
